tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vimal was perfectly explained and addressed the issue I was facing , he even showed me bone structure photos to explain all these. Unlike other doctors, he said it clearly no test or medicine would help just only rest, though just for my satisfaction he recommended 2 medicines also explained their functions. He gave his phone number, if I face any further issues I can contact him. He is very genuine and I would highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Vimal is an experienced physician. He listened me thoroughly then asked a few related questions and explained me the health issues. It was actually the other issue that I was ignoring for quite some time, Thyroid. I am very satisfied with diagnosis and advice by the doctor. Thank you Dr. Vimal!
reply_text: Thank you mam, for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Vimal was extremely patient while listening to my concerns, he thoroughly examined my knees and provided a detailed opinion. He advised the most apt blood tests and medications. His follow up process was extremely convienient and that saved my time and money, without compromising on the diagnosis. A feel lucky that I found him on practo and went to him. His dedicated consultation process deserves appreciation.
reply_text: Thank you sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor has listened to my problem, have let me understood the reason of the pain. He has described it in a way so that I could understand. He advised me to take medicines and exercise. I am taking the meds, will do the test recommended and will surely revisit.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words and appreciation .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I will not recommend Dr. Vimal at all. He barely spent 10 mins on my issue and did not even listen to the kind of pain I was feeling in my back. His advice for me was to ‘eat vitamin  d tablets’. I showed him my scan of my back and he recognised that there were some curvatures but blamed it on that I must have twisted while lying down?? The scan was when I was lying on my back which couldn’t have gone wrong in any case. **** * **** ** ** *** * ****** ****** ******* ** **** *** ****** **** **** *******  ***** *** **** *** *** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Vimal is so patient and also helped me with the ******* diagnosis. I am very happy with these two qualities. I have visited so many doctors,  but nobody could help me find out what is the actual reason of the pain in my hand. I had tried everything, but nothing worked. Dr Vimal helped me understand the chronological reason. Today I am sure that with Dr Vimal's treatment, the pain will go within few weeks
reply_text: Thanks sir

tags: None
review: I visited the Clinique for my back pack. It started suddenly and it's persisting till now. The doctor was half an hour late, the Clinique was quite shabby and smelled. Though the doctor asked me a lot of questions and gave me general medicine, the over all experience was bad.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback, hope to serve you better next time. Clinic was closed at that time and received you within 5-10 minutes of your call. As clinic was closed so may be not that much ordered as in working hours. Sir I asked lots of questions to diagnose the disease, as some are alright in 2/3 days and some require follow up and investigation. Hope to serve you soon!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I do not recommend the doctor
My experience was worse with clinic and doctor. **** ***** ** *** **** ********* ***** *** They are not taking any pracuation . Regarding my lower back pain doctor has given ******** medicine **** *** ******** ******* *** ***** ****** * **** **** **** ******** ***** ** ** ********** ***** ** **** ********* *** ** ********* Worse experience for me with the doctor in my entire life
reply_text:
Dear patient,
As you mentioned your detailed history of full sedentary lifestyle from past 3 months, and after my examination,it was a lifestyle related problems and required physical activities more than painkillers,so we mostly advised vitamins and health supplements.
Your apprehension,I understand,but from past more than 3 months,we wear PPE for hours during operations of lengthy surgeries in hospital ot,but for OPD government recommendations are mainly social distancing and hand washing and sanatizers and disinfecting space that we do regularly, and till now zero count of covid at our facility.
Most welcome 😊 for follow up .
Thank you for your valuable input 😊.
